name: Dark Mode
description: Switch to a dark color scheme that's easier on the eyes in low-light environments. Reduces eye strain and saves battery on OLED displays.

name: Advanced Calculations
description: Unlock advanced policy simulation features including multi-year projections, scenario comparisons, and detailed marginal tax rate analysis.

name: Export Suite
description: Export your analysis results to multiple formats including PDF reports, Excel spreadsheets, and shareable presentation slides.
